description.ko: 빛이 존재하지 않고 심우주의 압도적인 고요함이 천체 구조를 정의하는, VOID-3 프로토콜의 가장 먼 도달점에 대한 탐구입니다.
description.en: An exploration into the furthest reaches of the VOID-3 protocol, where light ceases to exist and cosmic structures are defined by the crushing silence of the deep universe.

prompt: Hyper-realistic wide shot of the VOID-3 cosmic station hovering in an absolute dark nebula, faint bioluminescent nebular gas drifting through obsidian structures, cosmic dust particles glowing like distant stars, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed textures, 8k resolution, cold and silent atmosphere, sci-fi aesthetic, deep space abyss.
